recipe.ingredients: 6 egg whites,2 whole eggs,1 cup fresh spinach, washed and chopped,1/2 cup mushrooms, sliced,1/4 cup onions, chopped,1 clove garlic, minced,1/4 cup reduced-fat feta cheese,1/2 teaspoon dried oregano,1/4 teaspoon salt,1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper,1 tablespoon olive oil
recipe.directions: Preheat your oven to 350 F.,In a mixing bowl, whisk together the egg whites, whole eggs, oregano, salt, and black pepper.,Heat olive oil in a 10-inch ovenproof skillet over medium heat. Add the onions and garlic, saut√©ing until they are softened.,Add mushrooms and cook until they are browned and their moisture has evaporated.,Stir in the spinach and cook until it's wilted.,Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables in the skillet. Cook for a couple of minutes until the eggs start to set at the edges.,Sprinkle the top with feta cheese.,Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the frittata is firm in the center.,Remove from the oven and let it sit for a few minutes before cutting into wedges and serving.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 480 (Total), Calories per serving 120, Total fat 24g, Saturated fat 6g, Trans fat 0g, Monounsaturated fat 10g, Cholesterol 370mg, Sodium 790mg, Total carbohydrate 12g, Dietary fiber 3g, Total sugars 6g, Protein 54g
